title: Diamond 'Addigai' Pendant - A Touch of Telugu Tradition
materials: 18K Yellow Gold setting. Features brilliant-cut diamonds of VS clarity and G-H color grade. Each stone is meticulously hand-set by our skilled artisans.
features: This exquisite pendant draws inspiration from the classic Telugu 'Addigai' (choker necklace) design, miniaturized into a modern pendant form. It features a stylized floral motif at its heart, surrounded by graceful, sweeping lines that mimic the traditional 'Addigai' shape. The pave setting maximizes the brilliance of each diamond, creating a dazzling effect. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear.
colors: Predominantly White (diamonds) with a warm Yellow Gold accent. This timeless combination exudes sophistication and elegance.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. A beautiful gift for weddings
or as a 'pasupu kumkuma' gift. Its delicate size makes it suitable for younger women and can be elegantly paired with both traditional South Indian attire and modern ensembles.
description: This diamond pendant represents a beautiful fusion of traditional Telugu jewelry aesthetics and modern design sensibilities. Crafted with high-quality materials and meticulous attention to detail, it's a timeless piece that will be cherished for generations. Its versatile style allows for effortless integration into any wardrobe. A contemporary interpretation of classic South Indian elegance.
